result.execSummary:
The defendant Matthew J Hargreaves was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Matthew J Hargreaves is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Matthew J Hargreaves was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
$1,000.00 cash bond to be applied with balance refunded to whoever posted it.
In the event of non-payment of outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.
Order for DNA given to the defendant in court. Must report to Barron County Jail on Tuesday, November 15, 2016, between 1:00 and 5:00 PM, to submit DNA sample.
